base_add_camera_no_voice_help_page_tip: Possible reasons why you didn't hear the voice prompt:
base_add_camera_no_voice_help_page_not_s: Only the battery powered security cameras support voice prompt. Please check the type of product purchased.
base_add_camera_no_voice_help_page_reset: If you have installed battery in the camera but still don't hear the voice prompt, please long press the "reset" button (as shown in the picture) until you do.
remote_config_page_video_section_sound_d: When disabled, you will not hear sound in live video or playback.
remote_config_page_notification_section_: Allow the camera to send notifications to your phone.
battery_page_statistics_close_dialog_mes: If you stop calculation now, the recording and calculation of device's online status will be terminated, and the relevant data will be deleted.
common_schedule_page_select_time_tip_pus: Customize push notifications at different times.
common_schedule_page_select_time_tip_sou: Customize voice alerts at different times.
live_hdd_not_formatted_tip: HDD is not formatted. You may not access playback feature.

hdd_config_page_no_sd_card_instruction_w: No camera SD card is detected and you cannot access the playback feature. Please cut off the power of your camera and insert an SD card as instructed.
hdd_config_page_no_hdd_instruction_witho: No HDD is detected and you cannot access the playback feature. Please cut off the power of your NVR and install an HDD.
forget_pw_page_find_reset_hole: 1. Long press the reset hole/button on the device for 5-10 seconds to reset your device to factory settings.
forget_pw_page_find_reset_hole_longer_ti: 1. Long press the reset hole/button on the device for 5-10 seconds to reset your device to factory settings. It may take 1 min to reboot your device, please wait.
forget_pw_page_erase_info_in_device_with: 2. After resetting, Wi-Fi info, device login password, and other related info will be erased and need to be reconfigured.
forget_pw_page_erase_info_in_cable_devic: 2. After resetting, Wi-Fi info, device login password, and other related info will be erased and need to be reconfigured. Please make sure the network is available before reconfiguration.
forget_pw_page_check_power_on: Please make sure the device is powered on and the network is available.
forget_pw_page_check_reset: Please make sure the device has been reset.
forget_pw_page_instruction_img_failed: Failed to load the instruction image.
live_spotlight_once_tip: Tap to turn on the spotlight. It will turn off automatically in {s1}s if there is no motion detected.
remote_settings_spotlight_page_func_intr: Turn on spotlight at night for higher-quality color image.
remote_config_siren_describe: The siren will sound when motion is detected.
add_device_wifi_not_set_describe: You need to configure Wi-Fi settings for the newly added or reset devices.
scan_setup_wifi_input_wifi_step_not_supp: Only 2.4 GHz Wi-Fi supported. 5 GHz network is not available now.
scan_setup_wifi_fail_connect_device_tip: Please refer to the following and try again:
scan_setup_wifi_fail_connect_device_tip_: Put the camera closer to the router.
Reboot the router or the camera.
ir_light_usage: See more clearly in dim light with IR lights on.
ir_light_turn_on_tip: IR lights will automatically turn on in dim light and turn off when there is sufficient lighting.
device_pir_settings_sensitivity_settings: Camera at higher sensitivity detects every small change in the field of view, such as a sneaky person at a distance.
Camera at medium sensitivity is moderately sensitive to changes, such as pets and dubious people not far away.
Camera at lower sensitivity only detects motion of bigger objects, such as running cars and people nearby.
remote_settings_spotlight_page_alarm_lig: Spotlight will turn on automatically when alarm is triggered at night, and turn off after a while.
device_login_page_connect_failed_msg: Please make sure your device is powered on and connected to a stable network before retry.
device_pir_settings_sensitivity_settings: Only the latest setting (shown on the top) will be saved when you set up one period more than once.
smart_config_power_on_and_wait_prompt: Please power on the camera and wait for the voice prompts.
smart_config_if_heard_voice: I have heard {s1} from the camera.
smart_config_camera_scan_code_with_some_: Please face the camera towards QR code and keep scan distance around {s1}.
add_device_prefer_wifi_connection_tip: If you prefer Wi-Fi connection and have not configured it yet, click here.
add_device_prefer_cable_connection_tip: If you prefer network cable connection, click here.
add_device_network_already_config: Have Wi-Fi Configured or Network Cable Connected?
common_no_sdcard_no_function: No SD card detected. To use this feature, please turn off the camera and insert an SD card.
common_sdcard_unformat_no_function: SD card not formatted. To use this feature, please format SD card first.
timelapse_describe: Time lapse feature enables you to capture hour-long or even day-long events, like sunrise, blooming and the work of building, etc. into minute-long videos or photo albums.
timelapse_end_task_dialog_msg: When you click Finish, the camera will stop capturing while the generated files remain. Are you sure to finish now?
timelapse_overwrite_files_describe: The earliest time lapse files will be overwritten when storage is full.
timelapse_battery_consumption_tip: Note: Battery may drain faster with time lapse enabled. Please pay attention to battery usage and charge in time when low battery warning appears. Or you can disable PIR to reduce battery consumption.
timelapse_photo_num_exceeds: Note: You can only save up to {s1} photos per day. You are recommended to set up shooting in a shorter period or at a longer interval, or record videos instead.
timelapse_file_too_large_help: To reduce file size, you may choose a lower quality or snapshot at a longer interval.
timelapse_cannot_cache_when_other_tasks_: There are other time lapse videos in the cache process. Please try later.
timelpase_cannot_change_quality_when_cap: Please stop the time lapse capture before modifying video quality, otherwise some of the time lapse feature may not be available.
timelapse_day_night_switch_msg: When day breaks or night falls, capture may switch between color and black & white. To capture in one color mode only, you may go to camera live view page - three-dot menu - Day and Night to choose the preferred mode. Note: With this altered, live view and record will change accordingly.
samba_enable_help_tip:
With Samba enabled, you may access the files stored on {s1} on a computer within LAN. It is recommended that you apply this service on non-public network only.

How to configure Samba on your PC? 
Open File Explorer - Type in \\{s2} - Press Enter - Type in username (admin) and password (the one you use to login your device) 

How to configure Samba on Mac? 
Open Finder - Click "Go" button on the top menu - Click "Connect to Server" - Type in smb://{s3} - Click "Connect" - Type in username (admin) and password (the one you use to login your device)
device_init_setup_wizard_samba_disable_t: With Samba enabled, you may disable it on {s1} settings page later.
base_bind_camera_unsupport_camera: Some cameras don't work with {s1} now. Learn more about {s2}.
base_bind_camera_no_support_camera_descr: There is no device available to be bound on your device list.
base_bind_camera_will_unbind_another_bas: {s1} has been bound to another {s2}. Are you sure to bind it to this {s3}?
base_camera_bind_base_bind_failed: Failed to bind camera. Please try again.

devices_page_delete_dialog_need_reset_ti: After deletion, the device will be unbound with your account. The next time you add a device, you need to reset it. If cloud storage service is enabled, the device will also stop uploading cloud videos.

deviceAddLogin_connectFailed_step2: 2. The device is too far from the router.
deviceAddLogin_connectFailed_step3: 3. This device only supports 2.4 GHz Wi-Fi, please check your router.
deviceAddLogin_connectFailed_step4: 4. The QR code number on your app might be different from that of your camera. Please check if the last four digits of the QR code number on the camera are {s1}. Scan the QR code after checking.
deviceAddLogin_inputData_voicePrompt: Please run the {s1} app, add the camera and set it up.
deviceAddLogin_inputData_notHeard: I didn't hear the voice prompt.
deviceAddLogin_qrcodeFailed_clue1: 1. The rear cover might mismatch the camera. Please don't mix rear covers of devices. Make sure they match and try again.
deviceAddLogin_qrcodeFailed_clue2: 2. If it still displays "QR code does not match" after trying the method above, please contact the support team.
deviceAddLogin_qrcodeScan_clue1: When you hear "Scan succeeded", the Wi-Fi connection is succeeded.

deviceAddLogin_wifiSolution_clue4: Please check your camera battery and power, and then push the reset button until you hear a voice prompt.

remoteConfig_battery_subTitle: View device's online status for last 30 days to learn device battery consumption details.
remoteConfig_battery_clue2: Running time includes the time taken to trigger alerts and access the device from app or Client.
remoteConfig_battery_linkTo: Note: Find more tips on how to extend battery life here.
remoteConfig_network_restartClue: When UID is disabled, device will no longer be accessible via UID to this or other platforms.

background_batteryDeviceClose: No operation for long. To save power, do you want to disconnect? The device [{s1}] will be disconnected automatically in {s2}s.

background_noDiskSpace: There is not enough disk space available.

remote_infrared_light_page_keep_off_desc: When disabled, night vision may not perform well in the dark.
FORMAT_SDCARD_REBOOT: Formatting will erase all the data on the SD card and the device will reboot. Are you sure you want to do this?
FORMAT_SDCARD_REBOOT_RELOGIN: Formatting will erase all the data on SD card and the device will reboot. Re-login is required after formatting. Are you sure to continue?
FORMAT_HDD: Formatting will erase all the data on the disk. Are you sure you want to do this?
FORMAT_HDD_RELOGIN: Formatting will erase all the data on the disk and re-login is required after formatting. Are you sure to continue?

IP_CHANGE_ADD_DEVICE: IP address has changed. Please obtain the latest IP address and re-add the device.
IP_CHANGE_RELOGIN: IP address has changed. Please obtain the latest IP address and re-log in to the device.
TIP_IP_CHANGE_ADD_DEVICE: Note: With IP address changed, you need to re-add the device.
device_restore_confirm_title: Please confirm you have reset the device.
no_permit_of_playback: No permission to play back this recording.
remote_settings_spotlight_page_auto_on_p: Spotlight auto turns on when viewing live feed and turn off afterwards.
remote_settings_spotlight_page_smart_nig: Spotlight auto turns on when alarm event is detected.
remote_settings_spotlight_page_night_vis: Spotlight stays on in night mode.
Spotlight stays off in night mode.
remote_settings_spotlight_page_timing_al: Spotlight stays on at scheduled time in night mode.
remote_config_email_smtp_incorrent_tip: Incorrect SMTP server info or port. Please correct it and try again.
remote_config_email_network_error_tip: Device network error. Please try again.
remote_config_email_address_or_password_:
Incorrect email password or SMTP not enabled. Please troubleshoot as follows:
Step 1: Make sure the SMTP server is enabled for your email. For details of how to enable it, please contact the email provider.
Step 2: Make sure that you enter the correct email address and password. Some email can only be accessed by entering an app password. Please set the app password and try again.
remote_config_email_not_allowed_email_ti: Check if you have typed in a correct email address or try with another email address.
remote_config_email_device_memory_error_: Device cannot send email now. Please wait and try again later.
remote_config_email_unknow_error_tip: Unknown error. Please try with another email address.
forget_pw_page_reset_device_out_of_reach: How can I reset the device that is out of reach?
forget_pw_page_reset_device_via_app: How can I reset the device via {s1} App?
forget_pw_page_reset_device_via_windows_: How can I reset the device via {s1} Client?
device_init_setup_wizard_create_password: The account info is required when you access device(s) on other platforms. Keep it for quicker access.
ptz_preset_point_description: Mark the current position as a preset point to set the patrol route.
ptz_guard_point_description: Device will auto return to the initial monitoring position after deviating.
alarm_tolerance_setting_page_description: Alarm will be triggered when a detection object stays in detection zone longer than the set time.
alarm_settings_person_sensitivity_high_d: Camera at high sensitivity detects moving objects with low-similarity appearance to persons.
alarm_settings_person_sensitivity_mid_de: Camera at medium sensitivity detects moving objects with medium-similarity appearance to persons.
alarm_settings_person_sensitivity_low_de: Camera at low sensitivity only detects moving objects with high-similarity appearance to persons to reduce false alarms.
alarm_settings_vehicle_sensitivity_high_: Camera at high sensitivity detects moving objects with low-similarity appearance to vehicles.
alarm_settings_vehicle_sensitivity_mid_d: Camera at medium sensitivity detects moving objects with medium-similarity appearance to vehicles.
alarm_settings_vehicle_sensitivity_low_d: Camera at low sensitivity only detects moving objects with high-similarity appearance to vehicles to reduce false alarms.
alarm_settings_animal_sensitivity_high_d: Camera at high sensitivity detects moving objects with low-similarity appearance to animals.
alarm_settings_animal_sensitivity_mid_de: Camera at medium sensitivity detects moving objects with medium-similarity appearance to animals.
alarm_settings_animal_sensitivity_low_de: Camera at low sensitivity only detects moving objects with high-similarity appearance to animals to reduce false alarms.
alarm_object_size_setting_page_descripti: Moving objects that are smaller than the minimum object size or bigger than the maximum object size will not trigger alarm.
alarm_object_size_min_description: Moving objects that are smaller than this size will not trigger alarm.
alarm_object_size_max_description: Moving objects that are bigger than this size will not trigger alarm.
ptz_self_testing_description: Calibration is under process. PTZ feature is currently not available. Please wait.
remote_settings_alarm_volume_description: Adjust the alarm and speaker volume.
setup_wifi_support_5g_tip: This device supports 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz Wi-Fi networks. Connect the device to 5 GHz Wi-Fi for a better network experience.
ptz_preset_point_not_support_cruise_desc: Mark the current position as a preset point.
scroll_mouse_wheel_zoom: Scroll the mouse wheel to zoom in or out.
common_most_current_version: This is the most current version available.
common_password_not_match: Password and Confirm Password do not match.
scan_qr_code_tip: Scan the QR code on the screen with camera.
scan_switch_same_wifi_tip: Switch to the same Wi-Fi network as the camera.
scan_go_back_title: Go back and add the device again.
live_page_stop_record_tip: Recording… If you quit now, the camera will stop recording and save the videos locally. Are you sure you want to quit?
ftp_test_error_451:
Login failed. Please check: 
If username or password is correct. 
If you have permission to log in.
ftp_test_error_452:
Failed to create folder. Please check: 
If your FTP server is full. 
If you have permission to create folder.
ftp_test_error_453:
Failed to upload file. Please check: 
If your FTP server is full. 
If you have permission to upload file.
ftp_test_error_454: Connection failed. Please check your network connection.
add_device_ip_description: Product IP can be used to add device or access device information.
area_detection_description:
When disabled, camera will send alerts about the whole detection coverage. 
When enabled, camera will detect motion and send alerts about the created detection zones.
detection_pet_decription1: Smart pet detection is added! This function is currently used to keep an eye on your dogs and cats.
detection_pet_decription2: When enabled, you can customize the camera to record videos and send alerts when it detects pet detection events, and filter recordings by pet when viewing the playback.
detection_pet_decription3: Note: This function is still in the internal testing stage and there is a probability of false alarm. If there is any, please feel at ease to share more details with us on our official website, which will help improve the products and user experience.
port_setting_rtmp_des: Note: When disabled, Client cannot access the device.
port_setting_http_des: Note: When HTTP and HTTPS are both disabled, device cannot be accessed via web browser.
black_white_switch_des: Go Black & White when ambient light falls below the set brightness value.
day_and_night_value_config_title: Black & White and Color Switching Threshold
day_and_night_value_config_description: Ambient brightness threshold when switching between Black & White and Color in Auto mode of Day & Night:
display_advanced_sync_brightness_descrip: Synchronously adjust left and right cam to avoid brightness difference
display_advanced_sync_brightness_warning: Toggling the switch will reboot the device
remote_setting_pre_alarm_description: When motion is detected, you will hear the pre-alarm sound from the camera, indicating the camera is determining the motion. The pre-alarm may last 3 seconds.
remote_setting_pre_alarm_sound_test_tip: Please move close to the camera to test the pre-alarm sound.
push_test_push_timeout_description: Push notification timed out. Please try again.
push_test_connection_timeout_description: Network connection timed out. Please try again.
push_test_ca_verify_failed_description: CA verification failed. Please calibrate time of the device and try again.
push_test_ca_certificate_wrong_descripti: The CA certificate is wrong. Please calibrate time of the device and try again.
push_tes_network_failed_description: Network connection failed. Please try again.
common_password_requirement_length: Password must be at least 6 characters.
common_password_requirement_characters: Password must be at least 2 types of of characters including digits(0-9), capital letters(A-Z), lowercase letters(a-z) and symbols.
download_cancel_tip: Closing current window will stop this download. Are you sure to continue?
wifi_qr_reset_heard_voice_tip: I have heard the voice played by the camera.
base_unbind_alert_message: After unbinding the camera, the previous video recordings remain in the Base.
base_record_view_in_base_tip: This video recording can only be viewed in Base.
ftps_protocol_description: The server must support the FTPS protocol, otherwise files cannot be uploaded.
ftp_swap_file_overwrite_description: This option will generate temporary files.
ftp_type_in_file_name_tip: Please type in the file name.
ftp_image_interval_des: When the network is slow, the picture might be damaged.
password_trim_warn: The first and last characters cannot be spaces.
base_samba_intro_tip: Enable Samba, you can access Reolink Drive on the LAN computer. When enabled, you can disable Samba on the Settings page. It is recommended to use Samba in non-public places.
base_samba_usage_step_one: 1. Obtain the LAN IP of Reolink Drive first.
base_samba_usage_on_pc:
1. Open Windows Explorer.
2. Enter "\\{s1}" and click Enter.
3. Enter the user name (admin) and password of the device.
base_samba_usage_on_mac:
1. Open Finder.
2. Click "Go" in the menu bar at the top of the screen.
3. Find and click "Connect to Server".
4. Enter "smb://{s1}".
5. Click Connect.
6. Enter the user name (admin) and password of the device.
https_settings_subtitle: A self-signed certificate is used by default, but you can also import your own certificate.
channel_not_support_siren: The device connected to this channel does not support siren.
date_and_time_settings_page_time_not_sup: This device does not support manual modification of time.
corresponding_area_settings_need_preview: Please check the preview screen of this device, then come back and set the corresponding area.
smart_plug_reset_tip_2: Press and hold the reset button for 5 seconds.
smart_plug_reset_tip_3: Check if the indicator light is flashing.
smart_plug_reset_contact_after_sales_tip: If the fault persists after the retry, contact the after-sales personnel of the corresponding channel.
smart_plug_reset_connect_wifi_tip: Connect to the plug Wi-Fi in system settings and then come back and continue setup.
smart_plug_auto_go_to_next_step_tip: After the connection is successful, it will automatically enter the next step.
smart_plug_schedule_link_conflict_tip: The functions below will be disabled after the device is linked
smart_plug_jog_switch_tip: The power will be cut off automatically each time after the power's on for a preset time.
smart_plug_no_device_to_link_tip: There are no devices that can be linked
smart_plug_link_tip: State and duration of the linked jack switch when the set type is detected within the scheduled time.
smart_plug_follow_state_tip: Follow the State Before Power off
smart_plug_connected_network_power_on_ti: When the network is connected and the socket is powered on
smart_plug_connected_network_power_off_t: When the network is connected and the socket is powered off
smart_bell_quick_reply_click_to_add_tip: Click the add button to record a quick reply.
wifi_frequency_tip: Wi-Fi frequency band supported by this device
smart_bell_chime_config_tip: Is there a Reolink Chime that needs to be connected?
device_upgrade_att_message_1: As AT&T will shut down its 3G network service by Feb.22,2022, the Go/Go PT devices using AT&T SIM card may not be able to access the network.
device_upgrade_att_message_2: If your Go/Go PT device uses an AT&T SIM card, please copy the link below into your browser, and download and update the firmware following the instructions.
device_upgrade_att_message_3: If the AT&T 4G network is not available in your region, please switch to another provider.
privacy_mask_screenshot_failed_des: Please check the device's live view before setting the zones.
base_sd_not_formatted_des: You need to format the storage device before you can normally use it.
reset_all_settings_dialog_title: Reset all settings to the factory defaults?
reset_all_settings_dialog_des: All settings will be restored to the factory defaults, including:
reset_all_settings_dialog_des_option3: The device may also be restarted during the process. Are you sure you want to reset all settings?
illegal_login_lockout_des: After a series of failed attempts within 3 minutes, your account will be temporarily locked for a few minutes.
lock_account_error: {s1}, {s2} attempts left before your account is locked
locked_account_error: {s1}. Account locked. Please try again in {s2} minutes
device_upgrade_att_message_4: If your Go/Go PT device does not use an AT&T SIM card
device_upgrade_att_message_5: If you have any questions, please contact the Reolink support team.
frame_rate_seq_des: Choose a multiple of frame rate
bino_stitch_setting_distance_des: Fine-tune the distance to achieve the best effect
ptz_detect_area_guard_point_des: The detection zone will be effective only after the monitor point is set.
ptz_guard_point_not_set_des: The monitor point hasn't been set.
reolink_network_service_enable_tip: This feature requires Reolink Network Service to be enabled.
reolink_network_service_function_title: Reolink Network Service offers the following functions:
reolink_network_service_function_des2: Email and FTP are excluded as their servers are not built by Reolink.
reolink_network_service_set_server_tip: Why does a server need to be set up?
reolink_network_service_disable_tip: You can only access the device through the LAN after disabling this function. Are you sure?
common_login_error_locked: Your account has been locked. Please try again later.
common_login_error_max_user_number: Maximum number of concurrent users reached.
login_lock_tip: {s1}. Your account will be locked after too many failed attempts.
iot_link_max_number_tip: No more device can be linked.
common_device_date_and_time_title: Date and time of this device
common_gps_privacy_purpose_tip: Used to assist in positioning and finding cameras.
common_gps_privacy_request_tip: {s1} requests to use location services to assist in positioning, finding cameras, and accessing Wi-Fi information.
common_password_contain_type_number_tip: At least {s1} types of of characters
common_password_contain_type_tip: Password must contain at least {s1} of the following:
common_password_weak_tip: Password must be at least 3 types of of characters including digits(0-9), capital letters(A-Z), lowercase letters(a-z) and symbols.
doorbell_default_voice_msg_1: Hi, we will be right there. Please wait a moment.
doorbell_default_voice_msg_2: Sorry, we are not home today.
doorbell_default_voice_msg_3: Hi, please leave the packege at the door. We will get it later.
facebook_group_des: A group where sharing videos and pics is more common.
forum_des: A forum mainly for support & troubleshooting.
reddit_des: A sub where people love to DIY and tech discussion.
timelapse_day_night_switch_msg_client: When the sun rises or sets, the color mode of the videos may change. To continuously capture videos in Color Mode or in Black & White Mode, go to Settings > Camera > Display > Day and Night. (Note: This change will also apply to live view.)
battery_ipc_power_saving_message: To save power, battery cameras will be disconnected in 5 minutes if there is no operation.
hardware_decoding_message: Before decoding with software, decoding with hardware first.
map_description: Add markers such as animal information and device used.
map_marker_description_1: Mark the location of Keen cameras and animals on map.
map_marker_description_2: Long press to add a marker
map_marker_description_3: Tap the marker to view contents
chime_qsg_sync_descrition_1: 1. Make sure Chime and the doorbell are powered on;
chime_qsg_sync_descrition_3: 3. If there is no sync feedback, please long press the sync button on Chime to resync.
chime_qsg_sync_descrition_4: 4. If it still doesn't work, please contact our technical support.
bell_different_guidelins_installation_ti: There are different guidelines for different installation methods.
bell_auto_reply_waiting_time_description: How soon the auto-reply will be triggered after the doorbell rings
bell_auto_reply_delete_description: This message has been set to auto-reply, and there will be no auto-reply voice after deletion.
bell_status_led_auto_always_light_descri: Status lights will provide different feedback on person detection, button press, and two-way talk.
image_push_device_support_description: This device can send image push notification
ptz_guard_point_set: Set Current Position as Monitor Point
live_bino_nvr_resolution_tip:
The output resolution of this camera for single-screen preview is 4096 X 1536, which exceeds the maximum resolution supported by this NVR. 
 Please set the resolution of this camera.
common_already_setup_device_tip: Device already been set up? Access it.
smart_plug_reset_description: After pressing and holding the reset button for 5 seconds, release the button to confirm whether the indicator light is flashing.
common_system_wifi_setting_tip: Find Wi-Fi settings in system settings
iot_connect_ap_failed_tip_1: Make sure that you have connected to the Wi-Fi of this IoT device.
iot_connect_ap_failed_tip_2: Check whether the device has been successfully reset, and make sure that the device is sending out Wi-Fi signals.
iot_connect_ap_failed_tip_3: Turn off the VPN to avoid its possible effects on the link between the IoT device and the Reolink app.
iot_connect_ap_failed_tip_4: If the suggestions above are not helpful to you, please contact Reolink support.
chime_volume_setting_tip:
1. The chime has 5 levels of volume (mute, low, moderate, loud, and very loud). 
2. When the volume is set to "low" or "very loud", there will be two beeps. 
3. When the volume is set to "mute", the chime will only flash.
chime_audio_setting_tip: Press the ringtone button to change ringtones
bell_make_sure_powered_on_tip: Please make sure the doorbell is powered on and the network is available.
download_auto_cancel_after_quitting_desc: Downloading files. Quitting now will cancel your download tasks. Are you sure you want to quit?
device_add_login_qrcode_scan_beep_clue: When you hear a beep sound, Wi-Fi is successfully connected.
cloud_plan_schedule_description: Set trigger conditions for uploading videos to the Cloud.
lockscreen_when_client_starts_title: Lockscreen password required when Client starts
resolution_not_supported_tip: Resolution not supported. Please adjust the resolution of the camera.
authenticator_code_description: Enter the 6-digit code you saw in the third-party authenticator app.
backup_code_description: Enter one of your 8-digit backup codes.
two_factor_authentication_send_email_des: Send authenticator code to this email address
gdpr_select_server_tip: Please select a regional server that provides network services for this device. Network services involved:
device_remote_serve: Services for Remote Access to Devices
forget_pw_page_cellular_device_tip: 2. After resetting, network connection info, device login password, and other related info will be erased and need to be reconfigured.
bell_install_with_wiring_title: How to power video doorbells using power cables?
bell_install_prepare_tip: Use a network cable of appropriate length. Plug one end of the network cable into the PoE port of your NVR or other PoE devices.
bell_install_find_place_title: Find a Place for Your Doorbell
bell_install_find_place_tip: Find a proper place for your doorbell. Do not include walls in the camera view. The walls will reflect infrared light and may cause a blurry image.
bell_install_height_tip: Choose a proper height for your doorbell. You are recommended to install the doorbell 1.2m (48'') high off the ground, in order to get an ideal camera view.
bell_install_wedge_function_tip: Check the camera view to see whether the wedge should be used to adjust the field of view. If a person standing in front of your door is near the edge of the camera's field of view, use the wedge.
bell_install_drill_hole_title: Find the Place to Drill Holes
bell_install_drill_hole_tip: Put the mounting hole template on the wall and find the place to drill holes as shown. (Note: The places of drilling differ when you use or don't use the wedge.)
bell_install_wedge_tip: Fix the wedge to the wall. If the wall is soft, screw the wedge to the wall directly. If the wall is hard, insert drywall anchors first. Drill a hole through the wall in the hollow part of the wedge to run the network cable.
bell_install_use_mounting_plate_tip: Fix the mounting plate to the wall. If the wall is soft, screw the mounting plate to the wall directly. If the wall is hard, insert drywall anchors first. Drill a hole through the wall in the hollow part of the mounting plate to run the network cable.
bell_install_mounting_plate_tip: Screw the mounting plate into the wedge.
bell_install_connect_cable_title: Connect Network Cable to Video Doorbell
bell_install_connect_cable_tip: Run the network cable through the wall and connect it to the video doorbell.
bell_install_fix_in_mounting_plate_title: Fix Video Doorbell to Mounting Plate
bell_install_fix_in_mounting_plate_tip: Follow the two steps above to fix the video doorbell.
bell_install_finish_tip: Press the doorbell button and check whether the doorbell and chime can ring. Check the live view on your phone.
bell_install_finish_error_title: Why is the doorbell status light white?
bell_install_select_network_connection_t: Select a way to connect the video doorbell to your network, via Wi-Fi or a network cable.
bell_install_prepare_network_cable_tip: Get a cable of appropriate length and attach one end of the network cable to the router.
bell_install_find_existing_bell_tip: Check whether the existing doorbell system is working. Push the button of the existing doorbell and find the chime following the sound.
bell_install_find_existing_bell_note: Note: If the existing doorbell system doesn't work, please contact a qualified electrician. Or, you can back to the first step and use a power adapter.
bell_install_turn_off_power_to_existing_: Power off the existing doorbell under the guidance of a qualified electrician. Press the doorbell button again and make sure that the chime does not ring.
bell_install_electrical_work_warning_not: DO NOT directly connect the video doorbell to the mains. Otherwise, it may cause fires, electric shocks, or other damages or loss. If you are inexperienced in working with electrical wires, please contact a qualified electrician.
This video doorbell supports a voltage of 12-24V AC.
bell_install_check_voltage_of_chime_titl: Check the Voltage of the Existing Chime
bell_install_check_voltage_of_chime_tip: Remove the cover from your existing chime. Use a voltmeter to verify whether the existing doorbell wiring is applicable to the video doorbell. If not, you need to bypass the existing chime. This video doorbell supports a voltage of 12-24V AC.
bell_install_check_voltage_of_chime_note:
Note: 
 1. The existing chime will no longer ring. 
 2. If you are inexperienced in working with electrical wires, please contact a qualified electrician.
bell_install_check_voltage_of_chime_erro: My wiring is different from the picture.
bell_install_connect_bell_to_existing_wi: Connect the existing power cable to the video doorbell.
bell_install_connect_bell_to_wiring_tip: Connect the power cable to the video doorbell.
bell_install_connect_bell_to_existing_wi: Note: Make sure that the Y-shaped plugs are separate from each other.
bell_install_connect_power_and_network_c: Connect Power Cable and Network Cable to the Video Doorbell
Run the network cable through the wall. Connect the network cable and the existing power cable to the video doorbell.
bell_install_connect_standard_power_and_: Run the network cable through the wall. Connect the network cable and the power cable to the video doorbell.
bell_install_restore_power_tip: Check whether the video doorbell is installed properly. If so, restore the power.
bell_install_use_adapter_prepare_tip: Place the power adapter near the door and set up the cables. Do not plug the adapter into the power socket at this point.
ai_animal_funcation_description: Supported by PIR and intelligent detection technologies, the camera detects animals and people more efficiently. You can get alerts and filter playbacks more accurately.
review_invitation_tip:
Please rate if you like this app. 
 Thanks for your support!
light_smart_night_vision_mode_tip: When the ambient light level is lower than the threshold, automatically turn on the light once the PIR sensor detects a motion.
light_night_vision_always_on_tip: Turn on the light automatically when the ambient light level is lower than the threshold.
light_schedule_mode_tip: Turn on the light as scheduled.
light_ambient_light_threshold_tip: Set a higher value and the light will be turned on earlier.
light_delay_turn_off_duration_tip: Time the light stays on after the motion ends:
light_alarm_audio_tip: Alarm audio can only be activated by linkage actions.
light_alarm_audio_use_tip: Use the following audios in linkage actions.
light_audio_used_for_link_tip: This audio is used for linkage-activated alarms. If deleted, it will be replaced by default audio.
light_setting_effect_light_mode_tip: This setting will affect the light activation condition in motion light mode.
link_action_schedule_tip: Select a day and schedule when to enable or disable it on that day.
cloud_plan_switch_overwrite_tip:
The storage used by this device in the current plan is more than the storage available in the new plan 
 When you change the plan, videos will be automatically overwritten according to the upload time. The earliest videos would be overwritten first.
chime_sync_tip:
The video doorbell and the chime in the same pack are paired by default. If you need to pair the chime again, follow these steps: 
 1. Power off the chime. 
 2. Power on the chime with the setting button pressed to turn on the pairing mode. Keep pressing the button for 5 seconds until the chime status light is on. 
 3. Press the doorbell button once. If the chime status light flashes twice and the chime beeps twice, the chime is successfully paired.
chime_reset_tip:
1. Power off the chime. 
2. Power on the chime with the volume button pressed to reset it. Keep pressing the button until you hear 10 slower beeps followed by 4 faster beeps, which means the chime is successfully reset.
cloud_test_error_10008: Busy. Only one test command can be processed at a time.
cloud_test_error_35: Failed to parse JSON parameters. Permission required.
cloud_test_error_43: Cloud storage is currently not available.
cloud_test_success_tip: A 3-second test video was successfully uploaded to the Cloud storage.
link_tip: If device A meets a certain condition, then device B will perform a specific action.
common_schedule_settings_page_tip: Select time to schedule when to enable or disable it.
device_switch_plan_tip_current_plan: This device has been added to
horizontal_tracking_range_tip: Limit the horizontal range of tracking.
horizontal_tracking_range_location_rules: Cannot use the same position to set the two ends. Please try again.
smart_battery_mode_tip: Automatically apply different settings for continuous recording according to battery levels to extend battery life.
smart_battery_mode_des1: The PIR alarm events will be recorded at full frame rate regardless of battery levels.
smart_battery_mode_des2: With the smart battery mode off, continuous recording will also be disabled when the battery level is lower than or equal {s1}.
add_device_light_connect_ap_tip: Find and connect to the Wi-Fi of "Reolink_Floodlight_{s1}"
pw_error_page_detect_device_just_reset: Successfully reset. Start the initial setup for your device.
push_delay_open_tip: When this is on, the delivery of push notifications will be delayed. Are you sure to turn this on?
email_delay_open_tip: When this is on, the delivery of email alerts will be delayed. Are you sure to turn this on?
common_rich_notification_des: Preview the detected event with a snapshot in the push notification.
device_login_page_connect_failed_tip: Please make sure your device is powered on and connected to a stable network.
port_setting_rtsp_des: When disabled, cannot access the device via ONVIF or other protocols.
hdd_config_page_device_restore_sure_tip: Device will delete all the recording files and reboot. Continue?
frame_rate_model_auto_tip: Use variable frame rate. Ensure clarity by adjusting the frame rate (NOT suitable for fast-moving objects).
frame_rate_model_fixed_tip: Use constant frame rate. Prioritize smoothness.
frame_rate_model_normai_tip: Use variable frame rate. Ensure clarity by adjusting the frame rate in gradual steps (suitable for fast-moving objects).
copy_device_settings_tip: Apply the same settings to the same models.
clear_horizontal_tracking_setting_tip: Are you sure to clear the settings of horizontal tracking range?
live_page_toolbar_ptz_3D_zoom_tip: Let the camera automatically focus on the area you drew.
forget_pw_page_erase_info_tip: 2. After resetting, the device information will be erased.
common_image_layout_switch_tip:
The settings of privacy mask, detection zone, and object size will be cleared after changing the image layout.
Device will reboot. Are you sure to continue?
image_model_expansion_switch_tip: The settings of privacy mask, detection zone, and object size will be cleared after changing the configuration. Are you sure to continue?
image_model_expansion_switch_tip2: The settings of privacy mask, detection zone, and object size will be cleared after rotating the image.
common_image_layout_tip: Customize image layout settings to meet your needs.
version_update_hint_tip: To use the new features of Reolink Client, please update to the latest version.
configuration_clear_failed_tip: Failed to clear the configuration. Please try again.
audio_name_rule1: The first character cannot be space.
live_floodlight_once_tip: Tap to turn on the floodlight. It will turn off automatically in {s1}s if there is no motion detected.
remote_settings_floodlight_page_func_int: Turn on floodlight at night for higher-quality color image.
remote_settings_floodlight_page_alarm_li: Floodlight will turn on automatically when alarm is triggered at night, and turn off after a while.
remote_settings_floodlight_page_auto_on_: Floodlight auto turns on when viewing live feed and turn off afterwards.
remote_settings_floodlight_page_smart_ni: Floodlight auto turns on when alarm event is detected.
remote_settings_floodlight_page_night_vi: Floodlight stays on in night mode.
Floodlight stays off in night mode.
remote_settings_floodlight_page_timing_a: Floodlight stays on at scheduled time in night mode.
pc_transpond_data_use_up_des: No data remaining in the view plan(s) of the device's admin account. Please log into it on {s1} App to check details or add more.
common_image_layout_restore_tips: You want to restore the default image layout settings?
common_image_layout_restore_des: The results of restoring default settings include:
gesture_operated_switch_tips: Tap here, then use one or two fingers to control the view.
common_image_layout_switch_tip1:
The settings of privacy mask, detection zone, and object size will be cleared after changing the image layout. 
 Device will reboot.
system_info_terms_and_policies_tips: Please open the following links in your browser or scan the QR codes to read the terms and policies.
common_email_security_protocol_close_tip: We recommend enabling SSL/TLS to secure data transfer. Are you sure to disable it?
common_ftp_open_tips: Data transfer will not be encrypted when using FTP. We recommend using it on your home and work networks, but not public ones. Or, you can enable FTPS on this device and on FTP server to secure data transfer. Are you sure to enable FTP?
common_ftps_des: To use encrypted data transfer, please configure FTPS on FTP server.
common_push_open_terms_and_policies_sure: I understand that {s1} will collect device alerts and device information. Such information is only used for {s2} App to push device alerts to me.
common_upnp_open_tips: When UPnP is enabled, the device's ports will be opened in the higher level network. We recommend using it on your home and work networks, but not public ones. Are you sure to enable UPnP?
common_server_des: {s1}'s basic network services. When disabled, you cannot access devices via {s2} Client/App.
common_rtmp_des: Audio and video communication services based on RTMP between devices and Flash Player on browsers.
common_rtmp_open_tips: Data transfer will not be encrypted when using RTMP. We recommend using it on your home and work networks, but not public ones. Are you sure to enable RTMP?
common_http_des: Access control services based on HTTP between devices and browsers. When HTTPS is enabled and HTTP is disabled, HTTP access will automatically jump to HTTPS.
common_http_open_tips: Data transfer will not be encrypted when using HTTP. We recommend using it on your home and work networks, but not public ones. Or, you can use HTTPS services instead. Are you sure to enable HTTP?
common_https_des: Access control services based on HTTPS between devices and browsers.
common_https_open_tips: HTTPS uses a self-signed certificate by default. You can also import your own HTTPS certificate by {s1} Client and use it. Are you sure to enable HTTPS?
common_http_and_https_close_tips: When HTTP and HTTPS are both turned off, you cannot access devices via browsers. Are you sure to turn it off?
common_rtsp_des: Audio and video communication services based on RTSP between devices and third-party applications.
common_rtsp_open_tips: Data transfer will not be encrypted when using RTSP. We recommend using it on your home and work networks, but not public ones. Are you sure to enable RTSP?
common_onvif_des: Access control services based on ONVIF between devices and third-party applications. To use ONVIF, you need to enable RTSP first.
common_onvif_open_tips: Data transfer will not be encrypted when using ONVIF. We recommend using it on your home and work networks, but not public ones. Are you sure to enable ONVIF?
common_uid_des: Product UID is the unique identifier of the device. You can use the UID to add device or look up device information. You can access the device on smartphones or computers via {s1} App/Client.
common_uid_switch: Allow {s1} App/Client to access the device via WAN using UID.
common_uid_close_tips: You're recommended to enable {s1} App/Client to access the device via WAN using UID for your convenient access to your device. Are you sure to turn it off?
common_uid_switch_tips: You can find this option and set it again in "Settings > System > Info".
server_settings_change_tips: After changing the following settings, you will log out of the device from the browser and need to log in again.
common_push_open_terms_and_policies_sure:
By continuing, I acknowledge that I've read and understood the {s1} and {s2}. 
I understand that {s3} will collect device alerts and device information. Such information is only used for {s4} App to push Reolink device alerts to me.
device_and_battery_pair_title: Pairing the battery and the device:
device_and_battery_pair_tips1: * Obtain the power of the battery
electric_quantity_information_anomaly_ti: Do not enable Smart Battery Mode when getting power fails
night_vision_focus_des: Optimize Focus in partial Night Mode situations
alarm_settings_installation_method_des1: Select the actual installation method to improve detection accuracy.
alarm_settings_installation_method_des2: Your option here will not interact with your option of installation method in live view or playback.
reset_all_settings_dialog_des_option4: Clearing the settings of privacy mask, detection zone, and object size
STR_PLAN_BUZZER_VIDEO_LOSS: NVR buzzer goes off when camera disconnects from network.
STR_CAMERA_COPY_TIPS1: Select Camera(s) To Apply Same Settings
STR_CAMERA_MASK_SET_TIPS: Drag your mouse to draw rectangles (up to {s1}) on the screen to block out specific areas.
common_service_unavailable: Sorry, this service is not available in your area.
overexposure_adjustment_des: Exposure in the selected areas will be decreased.
bell_install_bypass_chime_tips1: 1. Remove the cover of the chime. Make sure that the existing wiring can provide sufficient power to the Reolink Video Doorbell, which works with a power supply of 12-24V AC, 30VA, or 24V DC.
bell_install_bypass_chime_tips2: 2. Find the jumper cable in the product box. As shown above, connect the two ends of the jumper cable to the Trans and the Front terminals of the Chime.
bell_install_bypass_chime_note1: The old chime will not work anymore.
bell_install_bypass_chime_note2: The bypass can fix the issues including unstable power supply to the video doorbell and abnormal sounds of the old chime.
horizontal_tracking_range_des: No limit on horizontal tracking range by default.
STR_TIME_LAPSE_TOTAL_TIME_LIMIT: The start and end time interval cannot exceed 365 days.
common_delete_device_tips1: The {s1} View Service feature of this device will stop working once the device is deleted.
common_delete_device_tips2: The Cloud and {s1} View Service features of this device will stop working once the device is deleted.
common_delete_device_tips3: The Smart Home and {s1} View Service features of this device will stop working once the device is deleted.
common_delete_device_tips4: The Cloud, Smart Home, and {s1} View Service features of this device will stop working once the device is deleted.
common_reset_device_tips1: The Cloud feature of this device will stop working once the device is reset.
common_reset_device_tips2: The Smart Home feature of this device will stop working once the device is reset.
common_reset_device_tips3: The {s1} View Service feature of this device will stop working once the device is reset.
common_reset_device_tips4: The Cloud and Smart Home features of this device will stop working once the device is reset.
common_reset_device_tips5: The Cloud and {s1} View Service features of this device will stop working once the device is reset.
common_reset_device_tips6: The Smart Home and {s1} View Service features of this device will stop working once the device is reset.
common_reset_device_tips7: The Cloud, Smart Home, and {s1} View Service features of this device will stop working once the device is reset.
enhanced_night_vision_brightness_des: Optimize image brightness in Night Mode.
wifi_5g_prefer_des: Preferred connection to Wi-Fi in the 5GHz band
STR_LOCAL_NETWORK_TIP: To avoid IP conflict, subnet of the Default Gateway must be different from the gateway address of Network Settings.
rated_total_power_of_power_adapter: Rated total power of power adapter (W)
poe_power_abnormal_des: Because the HDD and motherboard in the NVR also need power, when the total POE power exceeds or approaches the rated total power of the power adapter, it will prompt that the POE power is abnormal.
maximum_power_of_the_port: The maximum power of the port (W)
poe_power_abnormal_alarm: Alarm when POE power is abnormal
position_mask_des: Added position mask function! Tthis function is mainly used to cover images in different positions, which can be more flexible and free to set the area of ​​the privacy mask.
position_mask_add: Create a mask by drawing a box on the preview screen.
device_auto_disconnect_without_operation: No operation for long. To save data, do you want to disconnect? The device [{s1}] will be disconnected automatically in {s2}s.
auto_connect_tip1: Disable automatic disconnection and don't remind me again.
auto_disconnect_des: When enabled, the device will be disconnected automatically if not operated for 5 minutes.
common_device_not_login: Not logged in to the device.
which_channel_of_the_same_wifi: Which band of the same Wi-Fi to connect
common_static_ip_address: Choose the static IP address for stabilizing the connection between {s1} and other devices.
device_bind_to_base_second_dialog_messag: After the binding, your device will upload recordings and time-lapse files to {s1}.
device_bind_to_base_dialog_message: After the binding, your device will upload recordings and time-lapse files to {s1}. Are you sure to continue?
device_ftp_bind_to_base_second_dialog_me: FTP bind will use the function of FTP on the device. Please do not change the configuration of FTP without care.
device_ftp_bind_to_base_dialog_message: FTP bind will use the function of FTP on the device. Please do not change the configuration of FTP without care. Are you sure to continue?
device_bind_to_base_second_dialog_messag: This device has been bound to {s1}. Are you sure to continue?
storage_medium_no_format_tip: Storage medium has not been formatted.
base_format_hdd_dialog_message: {s1} will delete all the recording files in the HDD. Continue?
ip_connect_type_switch_des: For a stable connection between {s1} and other devices, the static IP address is recommended.
remote_config_record_describe_with_hdd_o: With the feature enabled, the camera will record videos to the SD card or {s1} for later playback.
hardware_encoding_alert: Hardware decoding requires computer support to take effect. Turning this feature on or off requires to restart client. Sure you want to continue?
common_failed_to_get_info_retry_tip: Failed to retrieve information. Please try again.
suspend_liveview_notice: No operation for long. Live View will be paused after {s1} seconds for saving Reolink View Data.
connect_nvr_bundled_camera_tutorial: How to connect the cameras in the kit
nvr_bundled_camera_prepaired_info: Cameras in the kit have been paired with this Wi-Fi NVR at the factory.
nvr_bundled_camera_prepaired_autoconnect: When powered on, they will automatically connect and be added to this NVR.
nvr_wifi_settings_introduction: How to set the WiFi on this NVR
nvr_wifi_settings_introduction_des: After the initialization, go to Settings > Network > Wi-Fi page to set up Wi-Fi.
wifi_invisible_des: After hiding, please manually input the Wi-Fi name to join this network.
auto_connection_condition: Enable this feature to automatically connect and add the paired cameras to the NVR when the cameras are powered on.
connect_nvr_wifi_hotspot_tutorial: How to connect to the Wi-Fi on this NVR
sync_wifi_by_cable: Sync Wi-Fi info to the device with a network cable
connect_device_to_nvr: Connect the device to the NVR with a network cable
nvr_wifi_hotspot_qrcode_des: If the device does not support 5 GHz Wi-Fi, please switch to 2.4 GHz.
sync_wifi_to_this: Sync Wi-Fi Info to This Device
modify_wifi_hotspot_des: Please make sure all devices are within the LAN before modifying the Wi-Fi configuration.
auto_sync_des: Modified settings will be automatically synced to the devices that are already connected to this Wi-Fi.
variable_bit_rate_des: Control the bitrate automatically based on the complexity of the video image. If the bitrate is too low, your video may get blurred.
constant_bit_rate_des: Use a constant bitrate to compress the video. The image quality may degrade in scenes with large differences in image complexity.
encoding_format_des: Compared with H.264, H.265 is more efficient in compression and produces higher-quality videos. Correspondingly, it requires more computing power and more advanced hardware support.
local_record_switch_des: Auto save recorded videos to the computer. Sufficient disk space is required.
night_light_alert_des: Automatically turn on when the camera detect an event at night.
custom_schedule_des: Keep on during the scheduled time periods.
auto_supplement_lighting_des: Automatically adapt the brightness based on ambient lighting conditions for optimal night vision.
scheduled_light_alert_des: Automatically adapt the brightness for accurate detection in low-light conditions, and turn on when the camera detects an event during the scheduled time periods.
motion_detection_des: Detect movements by comparing changes in pixels in video images.
motion_detection_sensitivity_des: With sensitivity set higher, the camera can detect motion of smaller objects, which may also increase false alerts. With sensitivity set lower, the camera will detect motion of bigger objects, but the chance of missing motion events may also increase. Please set the sensitivity based on the actual installation location and scene.
infrared_lights_lightness_tip: Please adjust according to the preview at night.
firmwareUpgrade_ipc_done_des: Please wait for a few moments before checking the upgrade status of the firmware. Client needs time to synchronize it.
edit_rule_consecutive_spaces_error: Please do not input consecutive spaces.
common_not_support_iot_devices_tip: The device is not supported yet.
remote_settings_interframe_space_des: The smaller the I-frame interval, the higher the image definition and the bigger the file size. The larger the interval, the lower the image definition and the smaller the space occupied by the file.
common_special_character_bubble_tips1: Only {s1} is allowed in the input field.
common_special_character_bubble_tips2: Only {s1} and {s2} are allowed in the input field.
common_special_character_bubble_tips3: Only {s1}, {s2} and {s3} are allowed in the input field.
edit_rule_ftp_photos_or_overwrite_record: {s1} is not allowed in the input field.
common_special_character_bubble_tips4: Only {s1}, {s2}, {s3}, and {s4} are allowed in the input field.
common_nvr_fotgetpassword_tips: Please go to the NVR settings, select Camera, and then access the User option to view the default password or change it.
smart_config_scan_qr_25_30cm_code_help_p: Please face the camera towards QR code and keep scan distance around 25-30 cm (10-12 inches).
localsettings_general_downloadpath_des: Set the saving path for playback and time lapse files
local_record_des_2: Auto save recorded videos to the computer. Sufficient disk space is required.Use within the LAN (Recommended)
